book.title: The Pillars of the Earth
book.author: Ken Follett
book.note: An epic historical novel about craft, ambition, and the long game of building things that last.

podcast.title: Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
podcast.note: Sharp wit, weird news, and exactly the right amount of chaos for a weekend listen.

show.title: The Leftovers
show.note: My favorite series for its emotional range, strange beauty, and refusal to take easy narrative exits.

album.title: LUX — Rosalía
album.note: A record I keep coming back to for its bold production and genre-bending confidence.
